github_body:
General changes:
    * #221 Thumbnail generation for routes is now working properly again.
    * #216 Affixes page now has the option to go back and forward in time.
    *  Fixed an issue where the website would sometimes show 500 errors.
    *  Updated this week's affixes.
discord_body:
v2.7.1 (2019/08/13)(https://keystone.guru/release/v2.7.1)
General changes:
    * #221 Thumbnail generation for routes is now working properly again.
    * #216 Affixes page now has the option to go back and forward in time.
    *  Fixed an issue where the website would sometimes show 500 errors.
    *  Updated this week's affixes.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v2.7.1](https://keystone.guru/release/v2.7.1)

General changes:
* [\#221](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/221) Thumbnail generation for routes is now working properly again.
* [\#216](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/216) Affixes page now has the option to go back and forward in time.
*  Fixed an issue where the website would sometimes show 500 errors.
*  Updated this week's affixes.

changes.change: Thumbnail generation for routes is now working properly again.
Affixes page now has the option to go back and forward in time.
Fixed an issue where the website would sometimes show 500 errors.
